Install
```````


.. code:: bash

    `[sudo] pip install `

Usage
`````


.. code:: python

    >>> from osascript import osascript
    
    >>> returncode,stdout,stderr = osascript(code)


Examples
````````


.. code:: python

    >>> returncode,stdout,stderr = osascript('display dialog "42"')
